00017 
00018 const BOOLEAN TRUE = 1;
00019 const BOOLEAN FALSE = 0;

00021 /*----------------------------------------------------------------
00022                                 Templates
00023   ----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00024 
00025 template <typename T> inline
00026 T Sign(const T& a)
00027 {
00028     return (a < 0 ? -1 : 1);
00029 }
00030 
00031 template <typename T> inline
00032 T Absolute(const T& a)
00033 {
00034     return (a < 0 ? -a : a);
00035 }
00036 
00037 template <typename T1, typename T2> inline
00038 T1 Maximum(const T1& a, const T2& b)
00039 {
00040     return (a > b ? a : b);
00041 }
00042 
00043 template <typename T1, typename T2> inline
00044 T1 Minimum(const T1& a, const T2& b)
00045 {
00046     return (a < b ? a : b);
00047 }
00048 
00049 template <typename T1, typename T2> inline
00050 BOOLEAN Between(const T1& a, const T2& low, const T2& high)
00051 {
00052     return (a >= low && a <= high);
00053 }
00054 
00055 template <typename T> inline
00056 BOOLEAN TestBit(const T& b, const INT& i)
00057 {
00058     return ((b & (1 << i)) != 0);
00059 }
00060

00065 #if defined(APOXI_DISABLE_CPP_CASTS)
00066     #define static_cast apoxi_static_cast
00067     #define const_cast apoxi_const_cast
00068     #define reinterpret_cast apoxi_reinterpret_cast
00069 
00070     template <typename ToType, typename FromType> inline
00071     ToType apoxi_static_cast(FromType val)
00072     {
00073         return (ToType)val;
00074     }
00075 
00076     template <typename ToType, typename FromType> inline
00077     ToType apoxi_const_cast(FromType val)
00078     {
00079         return (ToType)val;
00080     }
00081 
00082     template <typename ToType, typename FromType> inline
00083     ToType apoxi_reinterpret_cast(FromType val)
00084     {
00085         return (ToType)val;
00086     }
